heading: Nephi kyerɛw ndzɛmba a ɔfa Nyankopɔn ho—Nephi no botae nye dɛ ɔbɛdan nkorɔfo ma wɔaba Abraham ne Nyankopɔn hɔ ma ɔagye hɔn nkwa. Bɛyɛ mfe 600–592 Ansaana wɔbɔwo Christ.

verses.txt: Na afei emi, Nephi, memmpɛ dɛ mekã m’egyanom hɔn ebusuasantsen ho nsɛm wɔ dza merekyerɛw wɔ ɔfã ha yi mu, na merennkyerɛw no dabiarada so wɔ mprɛtse a merekyerɛw yi do osiandɛ ɔwɔ kyerɛwsɛm no a m’egya dze esie no mu; dɛm ntsi na merennkyerɛw no wɔ dɛm nsɛm yi mu no.
Na ɔdɔɔ me sõ dɛ mebɛkã dɛ yɛyɛ Joseph n’asefo.
Na ɔmmfa mo ho dɛ nkyɛ mebɛkyerɛw dza ɔfa m’egya ho nyinara, na mbom ɔronnkɔ mprɛtse yinom do, na mbom mepɛ enya kwan wɔ do ama meetum akyerɛw nsɛm a ɔfa Nyankopɔn ho.
Mobotae kɛse ara nye dɛ mebɛkekã adasa aba Abraham ne Nyankopɔn, na Isaac ne Nyankopɔn, na Jacob ne Nyankopɔn hɔ ma wɔagye hɔn nkwa.
Dɛm ntsi mennkyerɛw ndzɛmba a ɔsɔ wiadze enyi na mbom ndzɛmba a ɔsɔ Nyankopɔn na hɔn a wɔnnyɛ wiadzemba enyi na mekyerɛw.
Dɛm ntsi mebɛhyɛ mbra ama m’asefo dɛ mma wɔnnkyerɛw ndzɛmba a no ho nnhia wɔ dɛm mprɛtse yi do mma adasamba.
